ch.uzh.ifi.MechanismDesignPrimitives

Interface Type

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicBid, CombinatorialType, ComplexSemanticWebType, MultiUnitAtom, SemanticWebType, SimpleType

    public interface Type
    The interface for an agent's type. This is a multi-valued multidimensional type, i.e., it may consist of several components (like the value, arrival and departure time etc.) The type also has to contain an interesting set (or sets) for which these characteristics are applied.
    Author:
    Dmitry Moor

      • getAgentId

        int getAgentId()
        The method returns an id of the corresponding agent.
        Returns:

      • getTypeComponent

        java.lang.Object getTypeComponent(int atomIdx,
                                  java.lang.String key)
        The method returns the component of the type vector, for example, a value, arrival and departure time etc.
        Parameters:
        atomIdx - - an index of an atom for which the component should be returned
        key - - a key identifying the component of interest (E.g. "Value", "ArrivalTime", "DepartureTime" etc).
        Returns:
        the value of the corresponding component.

      • getTypeComponent

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setTypeComponent

        void setTypeComponent(int atomIdx,
                      java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.Object componentValue)
        The method sets up a specified component of the type to a specified value.
        Parameters:
        atomIdx - - an index of an atom for which the component should be setup
        key - - the key identifying the component (E.g. "Value")
        componentValue - - a new value for the component

        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getInterestingSet(int atomIdx)
        The method returns an interesting set of the type corresponding to the specified index.
        Parameters:
        atomIdx - - an atom for which an interesting set should be returned (0 in a single-valued domain).
        Returns:
        an interesting set of the type.
